fullDescription.text: Command potentially exfiltrates secrets or sensitive data to external servers

help.text: Review and remove suspicious commands that may send sensitive data to external locations
help.markdown: Review and remove suspicious commands that may send sensitive data to external locations

fullDescription.text: Shell command appears to use obfuscation techniques to hide its true purpose

help.text: Rewrite the command to be clear and transparent. Avoid techniques that obscure the command's intent.
help.markdown: Rewrite the command to be clear and transparent. Avoid techniques that obscure the command's intent.

fullDescription.text: Command decodes and executes base64 encoded data, which can hide malicious code

help.text: Avoid executing encoded commands. If necessary, decode to a file, verify content, then execute
help.markdown: Avoid executing encoded commands. If necessary, decode to a file, verify content, then execute

fullDescription.text: Command contains potentially dangerous or destructive operations

help.text: Review and replace with a safer alternative. If necessary, scope the command more precisely.
help.markdown: Review and replace with a safer alternative. If necessary, scope the command more precisely.

fullDescription.text: Command downloads and executes code directly from the internet, which can be a security risk

help.text: Download the script first, verify its contents, and then execute it separately
help.markdown: Download the script first, verify its contents, and then execute it separately

fullDescription.text: Potential secret or credential found hardcoded in workflow file

help.text: Use repository secrets or environment variables instead of hardcoded values. Consider using GitHub's secret scanning features.
help.markdown: Use repository secrets or environment variables instead of hardcoded values. Consider using GitHub's secret scanning features.

fullDescription.text: GitHub Action is not pinned to a specific SHA commit, which may lead to supply chain attacks

help.text: Pin the action to a full 40-character commit SHA instead of a version tag or branch reference. Example: uses: actions/checkout@a12a3943b4bdde767164f792f33f40b04645d846
help.markdown: Pin the action to a full 40-character commit SHA instead of a version tag or branch reference. Example: uses: actions/checkout@a12a3943b4bdde767164f792f33f40b04645d846

fullDescription.text: Workflow uses pull_request_target event and checks out PR code, which can lead to code execution

help.text: Use pull_request event instead, or don't checkout PR code with pull_request_target
help.markdown: Use pull_request event instead, or don't checkout PR code with pull_request_target

fullDescription.text: Workflow uses 'write-all' permissions, granting excessive access to all repository resources

help.text: Use specific permissions instead of 'write-all'. Define only the permissions your workflow actually needs.
help.markdown: Use specific permissions instead of 'write-all'. Define only the permissions your workflow actually needs.

fullDescription.text: Use of eval in shell scripts can be dangerous as it executes dynamic code

help.text: Avoid using eval. Consider safer alternatives for your specific use case.
help.markdown: Avoid using eval. Consider safer alternatives for your specific use case.

rules.name: Continue On Error in Critical Job

shortDescription.text: Continue On Error in Critical Job

fullDescription.text: Critical job has continue-on-error set to true, which may mask failures

help.text: Remove continue-on-error from critical jobs or handle errors explicitly
help.markdown: Remove continue-on-error from critical jobs or handle errors explicitly
